article: A man got a new car and he was very proud  _  it. One day, when he  came  back home, he saw his three-year-old son  _  hitting the new car with a toy hammer. When the boy  woke up  in the hospital and saw his hands, he innocently said, "Dady, I'm sorry about your car." Then he asked, "but  _  are my fingers going to grow back?" The father  _  very sad.
